snippet: Government officials from the two countries have hardly worked in lock step in the FIFA corruption case. Swiss authorities are said to be wary of appearing as puppets of the United States.
abstract: Switzerland is helping United States with FIFA corruption case, but warily; FIFA investigators could jeopardize organization's cooperative stand if they do not share documents with United States, yet according to Swiss law they could face jail time for sharing documents with United States.
lead_paragraph: Government officials from the two countries have hardly worked in lock step in the FIFA corruption case. Swiss authorities are said to be wary of appearing as puppets of the United States.

headline.main: In FIFA Inquiry, Switzerland Aids U.S. but Is Wary of Being Eclipsed
headline.print_headline: Switzerland Helps U.S., but Warily, in FIFA Case
